認證需要您填入您實際的姓名，以證明為帳號之所有者，未來於出入金時的證明。因此若未: Authentication requires you to fill in your actual name to prove that you are the account owner. And the personal information will be used during depositing and withdrawing money in the future. Therefore, if you are not complete the verification, you will not be able to use some functions such as deposits and withdrawals, also you will not be able to enjoy the rights to receive rewards.
於會員中心按下『進行認證』之按鈕，或欲使用被限制之功能時，提供填寫介面以利會員完: Click [Verify Now] in the member center to conduct member verification.
1.晉升標準：會員的累積存款以及累計投注額在30天內達到相應級別的要求，即可在次:
1. Level-Up Criteria:
Your level will be raised to the corresponding level before 24:00 the next day when the accumulated deposit and betting amount meet the requirements within 30 days,VIPs at one level cannot leapfrog to another but must move sequentially through the levels.
2.保級要求：會員在達到某VIP等級後，30天內投注需要完成保級要求。如果在此期:
2. Valid Bet Maintain:
Must reach the required betting amount within 30 days after reaching a certain VIP level.
If the upgrade is completed within the required period (within 30 days), the relegation requirement will be recalculated according to the current level.
3.降級標準：如果會員在30天內沒有完成相應的保級要求流水，系統會自動降級1個等:
3. Downgrade Criteria:
The system will automatically downgrade by 1 level if you do not meet the required valid bet within 30 days.
The rebate and other favorable terms will also be adjusted to the downgraded level.
4.自升/降級日起算，每30天後會重新計算累積存款以及累計投注額。: 4. From the upgrade/downgrade date, the accumulated deposit and accumulated betting amount will be recalculated every 30 days.
5.30日的計算條件以升降級的當下重新計算(VIP0時是以當日往前30天的總洗碼: 5. 30 days valid bet recalculation term: Valid bet will be recalculated at the moment of upgrade/downgrade.
6.網站保留對活動的修改、停止及最終解釋權。: 6. The website reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to change, modify, add or remove portions of these Terms of Use, at any time.
